Desc.entry: Hearing aids are available to anyone under the NHS, subject to a hearing test. Repairs to hearing aids are now by appointment. The collection of batteries does not need a prior appointment, but production of hearing aid record book is required. This service can also be obtained by post. GP referral for new patients, self-referral for existing patients.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-4pm (referral appointments and collection of batteries); Mon 9.30am-1pm, 5-7.15pm, Tues & Wed 1.30-4.30pm, Thurs 9.30am-1pm, Fri 1.30-4pm (repairs, appointment required)
